original: Bourdin, Gösta, civilingenjör, Göteborg, f. 18/10/04 i Arboga av brygg :-äg. Carl-Gustaf B. o. Tora Cederin. G. 36 m. Elsa Hedberg. Barn: Margareta f. 39. — Stud:ex. i Vänersb. 23, avg:ex. v. KTH (mask :byggn. o. mek. tekn.) 28. Konstr. v. Waplans Mek. Verkst. A-B i Nälden 29, förste assist, v. KTH inst. f. vattenmotorer o. pumpar samt bergsmek. lab. 29-37, facklär. v. tekn. inst. i Sthlm 29-37, ritkont:chef v. Arbrå Verkst. A-B i Arbrå 38-40, därefter tekn. chef v. A-B Pumpind. i Gbg. Led. av Sv. tekn:-fören. fr. 28.
translated: Bourdin, Gösta, civil engineer, Gothenburg, b. 18/10/04 in Arboga to brewer Carl-Gustaf B. and Tora Cederin. Married in 1936 to Elsa Hedberg, with one child: Margareta b. 1939. He graduated from high school in Vänersborg in 1923 and from the Royal Institute of Technology (majoring in mechanical engineering and construction) in 1928. He worked as a design engineer at Waplans Mekaniska Verkstad AB in Nälden in 1929, then became the first assistant at KTH's Institute for Water Motors and Pumps and Mining Mechanics Laboratory from 1929-1937. He was a technical instructor at the Technical Institute in Stockholm from 1929-1937, the head of the drawing office at Arbrå Verkstads AB in Arbrå from 1938-1940, and then the technical manager at AB Pumpindustrier in Gothenburg. He was a member of the Swedish Association of Engineers from 1928.

workExperience.name: KTH Institute for Water Motors and Pumps and Mining Mechanics Laboratory
